response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 to us due to its unique features, quality, and the time invested in its development. Given its worth and the benefits it offers to you, we kindly propose a purchase price of $9,500. We believe this offer strikes a fair balance between the value we place on the product and the value you anticipate receiving from it. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 9500}
